sourcesContent:
import { useLocation, useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function FlightDetails() { const { state } = useLocation(); const { flight } = state || {}; const { id } = useParams(); if (!flight) return
No flight data found.
; return (
{/* Main Content */}

Flight Details

{flight.airline} – {flight.flightNo}

From: {flight.from}

To: {flight.to}

Date: {flight.date}

Departure: {flight.depart}

Arrival: {flight.arrive}

Duration: {flight.durationMin} minutes

Stops: {flight.stops === 0 ? "Nonstop" : `${flight.stops} stop(s)`}

Rating: ★ {flight.rating}

Price: ${flight.price.toFixed(2)}

Amenities

    {flight.amenities.wifi &&
  • WiFi
    • } {flight.amenities.meals &&
  • Meals
    • } {flight.amenities.entertainment &&
  • Entertainment
    • }
{/* BOOK FLIGHT SECTION */}

Total: ${flight.price.toFixed(2)}

Customer Support: +1 (518) 555-0123
); } // === SAME STYLES AS HOMEPAGE === const styles = { page: { fontFamily: "system-ui, -apple-system, Segoe UI, Roboto, sans-serif", color: "#111" }, container: { maxWidth: 900, margin: "0 auto", padding: "0 18px" }, header: { background: "#faf9f9ff", border: "1px solid #e9eef5", borderRadius: "20px", boxShadow: "0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)", margin: "12px auto", width: "95%", padding: "4px 0" }, headerFlex: { display: "flex", justifyContent: "space-between", alignItems: "center", padding: "0 10px" }, brand: { fontWeight: 800, fontSize: 28, padding: "16px 0" }, nav: { display: "flex", gap: 18 }, link: { textDecoration: "none", color: "#333", padding: "14px 0" }, authButtons: { display: "flex", gap: "10px", alignItems: "center" }, hero: { background: "#f6f7fbce", padding: "28px 0 40px", borderRadius: "20px", width: "95%", margin: "20px auto", boxShadow: "0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05)" }, heroInner: { display: "grid", gap: 16 }, title: { margin: 0, fontSize: 24, fontWeight: 600 }, card: { background: "white", border: "1px solid #e6e6e6", borderRadius: 12, padding: 20, display: "grid", gap: 10, boxShadow: "0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.04)", width: "100%", // make it fill the container maxWidth: "850px", // FIXED width margin: "0 auto" // center it } , // Booking box bookBox: { background: "white", border: "1px solid #d4d8e0", borderRadius: 12, padding: 20, marginTop: 16, textAlign: "center", boxShadow: "0 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.05)" }, bookBtn: { marginTop: 12, height: 40, background: "#2f6feb", border: "none", color: "#fff", width: "100%", borderRadius: 8, fontSize: 16, fontWeight: 700, cursor: "pointer" }, footer: { borderTop: "1px solid #eee", padding: "16px 0", color: "#666", background: "#fff" } };
